00046 template <class Component>
00047 TComponentRegistrator<Component>::TComponentRegistrator(
00048                      const std::string& componentId,
00049                      icomp::CPackageStaticInfo& packageStaticInfo,
00050                      const QString& description,
00051                      const QString& keywords)
00052 :      BaseClass(&Component::InitStaticInfo(NULL)),
00053        m_description(description),
00054        m_keywords(keywords)
00055 {
00056        packageStaticInfo.RegisterEmbeddedComponentInfo(componentId, this);
00057 
00058        m_keywords += " ";
00059 
00060        m_keywords += packageStaticInfo.GetKeywords();
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 //     reimplemented (icomp::IComponentStaticInfo)
